content.raw: The main intention for additional documentation is to point out which branch of `ros2` is compatible with the active branches of `gazebo_ros_pkgs`.  I noticed that this information was missing and the current documentation was not clear on indicating the compatible branches correctly. But I agree that the `ros2` installation need not be in this tutorial explicitly.
content.html: The main intention for additional documentation is to point out which branch of ros2 is compatible with the active branches of gazebo_ros_pkgs. I noticed that this information was missing and the current documentation was not clear on indicating the compatible branches correctly. But I agree that the ros2 installation need not be in this tutorial explicitly.
